products.name: SKU # 153RRRAN
products.description: A sleek and durable triple-gang wall plate crafted from brushed stainless steel with vertical ridges for a modern, textured look. Designed to accommodate three standard light switches, it features a polished finish, beveled edges, and six precision-fitted screws for secure installation. Perfect for adding a stylish and contemporary touch to any interior space.

products.name: SKU # 153TTTAN
products.description: A brushed stainless steel triple toggle light switch cover with a vertical ribbed design. The plate has three evenly spaced rectangular openings for switches, each secured by polished screws aligned vertically. The metallic finish highlights a clean, modern aesthetic, with subtle shading that emphasizes the grooves and edges for a refined look.

products.name: SKU # 153DAN
products.description: This image shows a decorative duplex outlet cover plate with a brushed metallic finish. The design features vertical grooves running from top to bottom, giving it a sleek and modern appearance. The two outlet openings are symmetrically positioned in the center, with rounded rectangular shapes, separated by a single flat-head screw that secures the plate. The metallic sheen combined with the clean grooves creates a contemporary look, while the beige background of the outlet openings provides a subtle contrast. This cover plate balances both functionality and style, making it suitable for modern interiors..
